nodes.speaker: johnson14
nodes.text: Ah, it's such a fine day! Why do you look so gloomy?

responses.text: I'm the embodiment of pure evil from the darkest corners of time and space, sent to wreak terrible havok on the surface of this planet.
There is a puzzle I cannot solve.

nodes.speaker: johnson14
nodes.text: Hmm. I suppose someone should probably do something about that. I'm a bit busy designing this bridge, though.

responses.text: I will rend it into so much monatomic gas.
How hard can that be? You just build a thing over the water.

nodes.speaker: johnson14
nodes.text: Someone's got a case of the Mondays over here.

responses.text: How hard can that be? You just build a thing over the water.

nodes.speaker: johnson14
nodes.text: The mathematics and techniques of bridge-building have been passed down through my family for generations, even from my very first ancestor, the great Angel Johnson I!

responses.text: That's funny, he didn't say much about bridges when I met him.
Have you ever thought about dams as an alternative to bridges?

nodes.speaker: johnson14
nodes.text: I should think I know more about my family history than you.

responses.text: Have you ever thought about dams as an alternative to bridges?
